MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  LL14 postcode area of Wrexham, affecting properties in Llangollen Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  10:15PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at Midnight on 20th February 2021.
